overview: Batter up! Curious George is back in 8 shows from his Daytime Emmy-winning TV series. George knows that a curious monkey needs to get outside and explore! From running the bases at a ball game to exploring secret underground tunnels, there are friends and adventures around every corner. Hit a home run with your favorite monkey in Curious George Plays Ball!
tagline: Batter up! Curious George is back in 8 shows from his Daytime Emmy-winning TV series.
title: Curious George: Plays Ball!
